metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20631 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in libgpac.a in GPAC before 0.8.0, as demonstrated by MP4Box. It contains an invalid pointer dereference in gf_list_count in utils/list.c that can cause a denial of service via a crafted MP4 file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20631` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
gpac-modules-base - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
libgpac11 - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gpac package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1+dfsg1-3').
